name: Circular Movement
author: Mero
info: This script allows for a freeform combo to move in a circular pattern. This can also be made into an oval and rotated at the center.
description: This script allows for a freeform combo to move in a circular pattern. This can also be made into an oval and rotated at the center.
setup:
Place the ffc at it's center and set it's attributes as follows. D3 and D4 are optional.D0: radius in pixels.D1: speed of rotation in degrees.D2: starting position in degrees. If negative it will be random.D3: radius2, this is used for the Y Axis, if set it will turn into a oval.D4: angle2, this will cause the oval to be rotated at it's center like in the picture above.
Requires std.zh which is included with ZC.
